name: B.L.U.B.B. Chapter I: The secret of the Lake
name_original: B.L.U.B.B. Chapter I: The secret of the Lake
description:
Join Terry Balim in his first real case. B.L.U.B.B. chapter I is a short point and click adventure inspired by classic Lucasarts games.

You could say that chapter I is the prototype for my point and click games. For the next chapters i´m going to build on this base, but i´m going to try doing some things differently.

Controls:

Right mouse click changes between "Use/Take", "Look", "Talk" and "Walk". 

Left mouse click on items to drag them on other things to use them together.

F1 opens the "Load/Save Menu".

Alt+Enter to exit full screen.

Available in english and german. Press E for english and D for german.
